Source.Name: woeusb
Source.Summary: A tool to create a bootable Windows USB drive from an ISO
Source.Description: WoeUSB is a simple tool that enable you to create your own usb stick windows installer from an iso image or a real DVD. It is a fork of Congelli501's WinUSB.

Package.Name: woeusb
Package.Summary: A tool to create a bootable Windows USB drive from an ISO
Package.Description: WoeUSB is a simple tool that enable you to create your own usb stick windows installer from an iso image or a real DVD. It is a fork of Congelli501's WinUSB.
